LanguageData.Plant_Psychoid.label: coca plant
LanguageData.Plant_Psychoid.description: A leafy plant. Its leaves can be refined into various forms of the cocaine drug.
LanguageData.Plant_Smokeleaf.label: cannabis plant
LanguageData.Plant_Smokeleaf.description: A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Cannabis leaves can be rolled into joints at the crafting spot.
